lines.text: You have not cried yet. When you find justice, then you will cry.
I want to know how it felt to put a bullet through a little boy's chest just twelve days boy his sixth birthday!
I want you to crush the Yakuza. I want you to hit 'em and I want you to hit 'em hard.
You know what really crawls up my ass? Assholes like you who give Asians like me a bad rap.
Ever heard of the Yakuza? If you ever meet one, go the other way.
I'm afraid that's a little too late for me, Mr. Smith.
